episodes.title: From Catholic to Cult to Free Thinker: A Journey of Hope | Shannon Q & Paulogia
episodes.description:
Original Episode Here: https://youtube.com/live/6WW6gO5yLJE

Caller Xavier opens up about his ongoing journey of religious deconstruction. While he's rejected religious doctrine, he grapples with maintaining a sense of wonder and connection to something greater. Using examples from the recent Wonka film to simple acts like wishing on eyelashes, the conversation explores how to separate comforting rituals from truth claims. The hosts provide guidance on maintaining intellectual honesty while being gentle with oneself during the deconstruction process. Xavier also shares how his views on issues like abortion evolved, demonstrating how questioning religious beliefs can lead to broader philosophical growth.
